title: Landing More Customers: A PWV Founder Event
description: PWV hosted founders and operators for an evening focused on GTM, marketing, and customer acquisition strategies. Featured speakers included Tom Preston-Werner (GitHub co-founder, PWV GP), Gorkem Yurtseven (fal), Cory O'Daniel (Massdriver), and Simon Box (ReSim), who shared proven strategies and case studies from building and scaling their companies. The event brought together the PWV founder community to tackle real challenges in landing customers, with actionable insights and opportunities for collaboration.

media.alt: Landing More Customers PWV founder event at 95 Cumberland St
media.caption: Landing More Customers: PWV Founder Event in San Francisco
